title: LetterLink
body: A puzzle, wordle-like, game which is being used in my master thesis at NTNU

title: F1 iCalendar
body: A service which parses formula 1 races for the current season into a iCalendar file, which can be imported into any calendar

title: Overtakst API
body: A service which gathers listing price as well as sale price for for a given apartment and calculates the difference. The results is stored in a database for further analysis

title: Portfolio
body: This portfolio page, showing off personal projects and contact information

title: Sangbok
body: A digital songbook for scouts, developed for the 1. Fredrikstad scout group, as my bachelor thesis

title: NTNU Online Webcalendar
body: A service which exposes a iCalendar subscription link for events hosted by the student organization Online at NTNU

title: NTNU Online Event Notifier
body: A service which exposes a iCalendar subscription link for when registrations for events, hosted by the student organization Online at NTNU, opens
